########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX
list(APPEND iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources
    baseband_derotation_impl.cc
    baseband_derotation_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    chunks_to_symbols_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    constellation_decoder_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    estimate_dBm_ff_impl.cc
    evm_biased_bpsk_impl.cc
    frame_sync_cc_impl.cc
    multiply_length_tag_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    packet_header_parser_impl.cc
    phase_freq_correction_impl.cc
    phy_agc_impl.cc
    phy_header_payload_demux_impl.cc
    repack_bits_tagged_stream_impl.cc
    )

set(iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources "${iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink SHARED ${iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime gnuradio::gnuradio-fft gnuradio::gnuradio-blocks gnuradio::gnuradio-analog gnuradio::gnuradio-filter gnuradio::gnuradio-digital ${Boost_LIBRARIES})
target_include_directories(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_iNETS_PacketizedLink_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-iNETS_PacketizedLink)

if(NOT test_iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_iNETS_PacketizedLink_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("iNETS_PacketizedLink_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
